item.title: Easy of Leetcode
item.description: Easy of Leetcode 🔗// 1. func twoSum(nums []int, target int) []int { var items = make(map[int]int, len(nums)) for k, v := range nums { if itemKey, ok := items[target-v]; ok { return []int{itemKey, k} } items[v] = k } return []int{} } // 9. func isPalindrome(x int) bool { var oldNum, newNum, position int oldNum = x for x > 0 { position = x % 10 newNum = newNum*10 + position x = x / 10 } return oldNum == newNum } // 13.

item.title: Go 实用工具
item.description: Go 实用工具 🔗Go语言生态有很多流行的框架、库和轮子，在我们工作学习中经常用到。 Golang (The Go Programming language) Kubernetes (production-grade Container Scheduling and Management) hugo (The world’s fastest framework for building websites) awesome-go (A curated list of awesome Go frameworks, libraries, and software) gin

item.title: Golang 标准库
item.description: Golang 标准库 🔗Go标准库源代码地址：这里 Package builtin provides documentation for Go's predeclared identifiers. The items documented here are not actually in package builtin but their descriptions here allow godoc to present documentation for the language's special identifiers. 标准库 Builtin 提供Go语言预定义的类型和函数。

item.title: Golang 面试题
item.description: Golang 面试题 🔗= 和 := 的区别？ 🔗=只有赋值作用，而:=除去赋值外，还包含声明的作用。 因此，在变量第一次声明，可以使用var a = 0，也可以使用a := 0
